entries.npc_9: Go on in then, and talk to Huff.  He'll be glad to see you.
entries.player_8: I'm not ready to give it up yet.
entries.npc_7: Just like Jabba.  I hear he and Jabba are friends.  They're always exchanging gifts from what I hear.  I think it's a Hutt thing.
entries.npc_6: He's a gangster.  Lives on Naboo, I hear, though no one seems to know where.  I would guess the swamps myself.
entries.npc_5: It was stolen in a shipment that was on it's way to Tatooine.  That's about all I know.
entries.npc_4: It's an antique.  I think he wants it as an heirloom to hand down to one of his kids.
entries.player_3: Why does Huff want this rifle?
entries.npc_3: Some thieves were arrested in Bestine the other day, claimed to be employees of Borvo the Hutt's.  You know Borvo?
entries.npc_2: He's looking for a tusken Rifle.  Some antique owned by the first king of the Tuskens or something.
entries.player_1: What is it that he wants?
entries.npc_1: We're not letting anyone in until the boss gets what he wants.
